author: PTI
title: 99 institutes to take part in plasma therapy trials
description: 99 institutes to take part in plasma therapy trialsConvalescent plasma is an experimental procedure for COVID-19 patients. As per the guidelines, hospitals and institutions planning to provide this modality of treatment should do so in a clinical trial with p…
content: NEW DELHI: The Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) has received 99 applications from institutes expressing interest in participating in a randomised controlled study to assess the safety and efficacy of convalescent plasma to limit complications associa… [+2066 chars]
